paper_abstract: This paper presents an interactive news announcer robot system IRIOS that performs on the humanoid robot, Robovie. IRIOS satisfies the interest trend requirement and the topic change requirement for a capricious user by Time Conscious(TC)-,TfIdf vector. The results of experiments showed that TC-TfIdf strategy satisfied both requirements while other strategies did not.
paper_title: IRIOS: Interactive news announcer robot system
